OCD.name: DrL (VxOrd)
OCD.description: This algorithm lays out nodes based on the VxOrd force-directed layout algorithm.

AD.name: Edge Cutting
AD.description: Sets the amount of automatic edge-cutting to do, between 0 (no edge cutting) and 1 (maximal edge cutting)

AD.name: Edge Weight Attribute
AD.description: Enter the exact name of the edge attribute to use as the weight. The attribute values must be numbers.

AD.name: X Position Attribute
AD.description: Enter the exact name of the attribute to create for the X position of the layout.

AD.name: Y Position Attribute
AD.description: Enter the exact name of the attribute to create for the Y position of the layout.
